import zipfile
import os
from io import BytesIO
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql.functions import col

zip_file_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/sweden_medicine.zip"
extract_path = "/tmp/unzipped"

os.makedirs(extract_path, exist_ok=True)

# Load zip file as binary from ADLS
zip_bytes = spark.read.format("binaryFile").load(zip_file_path).collect()[0].content

# Open it as a zip archive in memory
with zipfile.ZipFile(BytesIO(zip_bytes), 'r') as zip_ref:
    zip_ref.extractall(extract_path)

# List extracted CSV files
csv_files = [f for f in os.listdir(extract_path) if f.endswith('.csv')]
print(csv_files)
##### Create dataframes out of correct CSV files

# Construct paths
dispensed_units_path = "file://" + os.path.join(extract_path, csv_files[-1])
users_path = "file://" + os.path.join(extract_path, csv_files[-2])

# Create spark dataframes out of CSVs
df_dispensed_units = spark.read.option("header", True).option("delimiter", ";").csv(dispensed_units_path)
df_users = spark.read.option("header", True).option("delimiter", ";").csv(users_path)

df_dispensed_units.show(5)
df_users.show(5)
##### Filter data to include correct measure, all ages and both sexes

# List of relevant ATC codes
atc_codes = [
    'A10AB01','A10AB03','A10AB04','A10AB05','A10AB06',
    'A10AC01','A10AC03','A10AC30','A10AD01','A10AD03',
    'A10AD04','A10AD05','A10AE01','A10AE02','A10AE04',
    'A10AE05','A10AE06','A10AE54','A10AE56','A10BA02',
    'A10BB01','A10BB02','A10BB07','A10BB12','A10BD03',
    'A10BD04','A10BD05','A10BD07','A10BD08','A10BD10',
    'A10BD11','A10BD15','A10BD19','A10BD20','A10BD21',
    'A10BD23','A10BD24','A10BF01','A10BG01','A10BG02',
    'A10BG03','A10BH01','A10BH02','A10BH03','A10BH05',
    'A10BJ01','A10BJ02','A10BJ03','A10BJ05','A10BJ06',
    'A10BK01','A10BK02','A10BK03','A10BK04','A10BX02','A10BX03'
    ]

# Filter dispensed units dataframe
df_dispensed_units_filtered = df_dispensed_units.filter(
    (col("Mått") == 3) &
    (col("Region") == 0) &
    (col("ATC-kod").isin(atc_codes)) &
    (col("Ålder") == 99) &
    (col("Kön") == 3)
)

# Filter users dataframe
df_users_filtered = df_users.filter(
    (col("Mått") == 1) &
    (col("Region") == 0) &
    (col("ATC-kod").isin(atc_codes)) &
    (col("Ålder") == 99) &
    (col("Kön") == 3)
)

df_dispensed_units_filtered.show(5)
df_users_filtered.show(5)
df_dispensed_units_filtered.select("ATC-kod").distinct().show()

# Remove unnecessary columns
df_dispensed_units_minimal = df_dispensed_units_filtered[["År", "ATC-kod", "Värde"]]
df_users_minimal = df_users_filtered[["År", "ATC-kod", "Värde"]]

# Rename columns
df_dispensed_units_renamed = (
    df_dispensed_units_minimal
    .withColumnRenamed("År", "year")
    .withColumnRenamed("ATC-kod", "atc_level_5")
    .withColumnRenamed("Värde", "dispensed_units")
)

df_users_renamed = (
    df_users_minimal
    .withColumnRenamed("År", "year")
    .withColumnRenamed("ATC-kod", "atc_level_5")
    .withColumnRenamed("Värde", "users")
)

df_dispensed_units_renamed.show(5)
df_users_renamed.show(5)
